title: BRIEF-James E. Wagner Cultivation Announces Entering Into Of Non-Binding Term Sheet With Trichome Financial For Loan Of $4 Mln
text:
BRIEF-James E. Wagner Cultivation Announces Entering Into Of Non-Binding Term Sheet With Trichome Financial For Loan Of $4 Mln

Stock Markets 55 minutes ago (Oct 04, 2019 07:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-James E. Wagner Cultivation Announces Entering Into Of Non-Binding Term Sheet With Trichome Financial For Loan Of $4 Mln Oct 4 (Reuters) - James E Wagner Cultivation Corp : * JAMES E. WAGNER CULTIVATION ANNOUNCES ENTERING INTO OF NON-BINDING TERM SHEET WITH TRICHOME FINANCIAL CORP. FOR LOAN OF $4 MILLION
